title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, your new go-to for effortless, long-lasting eye looks! Available in three stunning finishes - Matte, Shimmer, and Metallic - this highly pigmented eyeshadow stick is perfect for creating a variety of looks that will last all day.

The Julep Eyeshadow Stick features a unique crème-to-powder formula that glides on smoothly and sets to a beautiful matte finish. With its waterproof and crease-proof formula, you can trust that your eye makeup will stay put, no matter what the day brings. Plus, its built-in smudger allows for easy blending and application, making it the perfect tool for creating both subtle and dramatic looks.

But the Julep Eyeshadow Stick isn't just great for your makeup routine - it's also packed with skin-loving ingredients like Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax. These powerful antioxidants help to nourish and hydrate your skin, while also providing protection against environmental damage.

With 30 shades to choose from, there's a Julep Eyeshadow Stick for every occasion and every skin tone. And because it's suitable for delicate sensitive skin, you can feel confident using it every day.

So why wait? Upgrade your makeup routine with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte today!
